properties.entry: The "version" command displays the current application version.

The server command starts a server. The command, internally, opens a database and starts a server that stays running in the foreground. The command is intended to be used under process supervision systems such as daemontools[0] or runit[1].
[0] https://cr.yp.to/daemontools.html [1] http://smarden.org/runit/
